catalog_info.title: Intermediate Twi
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Twi A or the equivalent of one year's study of Twi.
catalog_info.description: Continuation of Twi A. Twi is one of the regional languages of the Akan speaking peoples of Ghana constituting the largest ethnic group in Ghana. Twi is fast becoming the lingua franca of the country. The Akan people are well known for their art and culture, especially the traditional colorful Kente cloth.  Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
